sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PERSON ( person_id, virtual_account, name, nickname, balance, id_number, sex, birthday, local_calls, phone, email, skype, career, recipient, rec_add, rec_num, company_tax_id, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #personId#, #virtualAccount#, #name#, #nickname#, #balance#, #idNumber#, #sex#, #birthday#, #localCalls#, #phone#, #email#, #skype#, #career#, #recipient#, #recAdd#, #recNum#, #companyTaxId#, #updater#, #updateTime# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT person_id,virtual_account,name,nickname,balance,id_number,sex,birthday,local_calls,phone,email,skype,career,recipient,rec_add,rec_num,company_tax_id,updater,update_time FROM PERSON person_id = #personId# virtual_account = #virtualAccount# name = #name# nickname = #nickname# balance = #balance# id_number = #idNumber# sex = #sex# birthday = #birthday# local_calls = #localCalls# phone = #phone# email = #email# skype = #skype# career = #career# recipient = #recipient# rec_add = #recAdd# rec_num = #recNum# company_tax_id = #companyTaxId# updater = #updater# update_time = #updateTime# ORDER BY $order$ $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PERSON person_id = #personId# virtual_account = #virtualAccount# name = #name# nickname = #nickname# balance = #balance# id_number = #idNumber# sex = #sex# birthday = #birthday# local_calls = #localCalls# phone = #phone# email = #email# skype = #skype# career = #career# recipient = #recipient# rec_add = #recAdd# rec_num = #recNum# company_tax_id = #companyTaxId# updater = #updater# update_time = #updateTime# WHERE person_id = #personId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PERSON ( person_id, virtual_account, name, nickname, balance, id_number, sex, birthday, local_calls, phone, email, skype, career, recipient, rec_add, rec_num, company_tax_id, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #personId#, #virtualAccount#, #name#, #nickname#, #balance#, #idNumber#, #sex#, #birthday#, #localCalls#, #phone#, #email#, #skype#, #career#, #recipient#, #recAdd#, #recNum#, #companyTaxId#, #updater#, #updateTime# ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE person_id = #personId#, virtual_account = #virtualAccount#, name = #name#, nickname = #nickname#, balance = #balance#, id_number = #idNumber#, sex = #sex#, birthday = #birthday#, local_calls = #localCalls#, phone = #phone#, email = #email#, skype = #skype#, career = #career#, recipient = #recipient#, rec_add = #recAdd#, rec_num = #recNum#, company_tax_id = #companyTaxId#, updater = #updater#, update_time = #updateTime#
